baseRule.text: 若比丘尼共諍已默聽。作是念。諸比丘尼所說我當憶持。波逸提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 45

fullParallels.text: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṁ bhaṇḍanajātānaṁ kalahajātānaṁ vivādāpannānaṁ upassutiṁ tiṭṭheyya “yaṁ ime bhaṇissanti, taṁ sossāmī”ti etadeva paccayaṁ karitvā anaññaṁ, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 78

translations.text: Welcher Mönch auch immer sich Mönchen, die am Schimpfen und Zanken sind und in Wortstreit geraten sind, lauschend zugesellt (in der Absicht): „Ich werde mir anhören, was sie sagen werden!“, muß, wenn er es aus eben diesem Grund tut und aus keinem anderen, dafür sühnen.
If a monk eavesdrops on monks who are arguing and disputing, thinking, ‘I’ll hear what they say,’ and he does so only for this reason and no other, he commits an offense entailing confession.

Si un bhikkhu está escuchando a escondidas a otros bhikkhus cuando están discutiendo, peleando y disputando [pensando]: «Voy a enterarme de lo que dicen [y esparcir rumores]». Si lo hace por esa razón, y no otra: [La acción] ha de ser confesada

fullParallels.text: 若比丘共諸比丘鬪亂諍訟時。屏處默然立聽作是念。諸比丘。所說我當憶持。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 76

fullParallels.text: 若比丘與他鬪諍已。盜往聽者。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 76

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻知餘苾芻評論事生求過紛擾諍競而住。默然往彼聽其所說。作如是念。我欲聽已當令鬪亂。以此為緣者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 76

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。共諍己默聽作是念。諸比丘所說我憶持。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 60

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。諸比丘諍訟時默然立聽。彼有所說我當憶持。作是因緣不異。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhu Pācittiya 78

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘！比丘共鬪諍已，聽此語向彼說，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 77

translations.text: If a monk, knowing that a certain monk has had a quarrel with another, having listened to what this one says, goes and repeats it to the other, it is Pācittiya.
Setelah beberapa orang bhikṣu telah berselisih, jika seorang bhikṣu mendengarnya dan berbicara kepada para bhikṣu lain tentang perselisihan itu, ia melakukan sebuah pāyattika.

fullParallels.text: 鬪諍。聽此語已向彼若比丘知他比丘共說者。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 77

fullParallels.text: 若比丘知他共鬪諍。默然聽此語向彼說。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Kāśyapīya Bhikkhu Pācittiya 76

fullParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhunīnaṁ bhaṇḍanajātānaṁ kalahajātānaṁ vivādāpannānaṁ upassutiṁ tiṭṭheyya, “yaṁ imā bhaṇissanti, taṁ sossāmī”ti etadeva paccayaṁ karitvā anaññaṁ, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 156

translations.text: Welche Nonne auch immer sich Nonnen, die am Schimpfen und Zanken sind und in Wortstreit geraten sind, lauschend zugesellt ‚in der Absicht‘: „Ich werde mir anhören, was sie sagen werden!“, muß, wenn sie es aus eben diesem Grund tut und aus keinem anderen, dafür sühnen.

Should any bhikkhuni stand eavesdropping on bhikkhunis when they are arguing, quarreling, and disputing (thinking): ‘I will overhear what they say’—if doing it for just this reason and no other—it is to be confessed.

Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang berdiri menguping pada para Bhikkhuni ketika mereka berdebat, bertengkar, dan berselisih (dengan berpikir): ‘Saya akan mendengar apa yang mereka katakan’—jika ia melakukannya hanya untuk alasan ini dan tidak ada alasan lain—itu harus di akui.

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，比丘尼共鬪諍後，聽此語已，欲向彼說，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 61

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼欲知是法者。應從此戒中學。當問餘比丘。持修多羅持毘尼持摩多羅伽者。應如是問。是語云何。是事應爾。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 60

fullParallels.text: 若苾芻尼實欲求解彼者。當問三藏。此是時。若復苾芻尼知餘苾芻尼評論事生求過紛擾諍競而住。默然往彼聽其所說。作如是念。我欲聽已。當令鬪亂。以此為緣者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 59

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。諸比丘尼諍訟時。默然立聽。彼有說者我當憶持作是因緣不異波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 58
